app.name: Undo Macro (Simple)
app.short_description: Clear unsent macro text and reset tags.
app.long_description: Adds an Undo button in the ticket sidebar to clear composer text and reset ticket tags to the last saved set.

ui.heading: Undo Macro
ui.hint: Clears unsent macro text and resets tags to the last saved set.
ui.reset_link: Reset tags to last saved (no comment clear)

status.undo_success: Macro text cleared and tags reset to last saved.
status.undo_error: Could not undo. Check permissions or refresh the ticket.
status.reset_error: Could not reset tags. Check permissions or refresh the ticket.
